name: codmon-image-downloader
description: parents.codmon.com で動作する画像のダウンローダーです

scripts.release: yarn build && yarn pre-release && yarn package && yarn release:gh
scripts.release:gh: gh release create v$npm_package_version releases/codmon-image-downloader-v$npm_package_version.zip -t "Release v$npm_package_version" -n "$(git log $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 HEAD^)..HEAD --pretty=format:'%h - %s%n')"
